sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; function AccountSettings() { const [workHours, setWorkHours] = useState([]); return (

Account Settings

Select time blocks for your work schedule.

{Array(7).fill().map((_, day) => (

Day {day + 1}

{Array(24).fill().map((_, hour) => (
setWorkHours([...workHours, { day, hour }])}> {hour}:00
))}
))}
High Energy Usage Alert
Power Outage Alert
Monthly Cost Alert
Monthly Savings Alert
); } export default AccountSettings;
